1019:4: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kkacit|
1019:10: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate|
1019:14: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam|
1019:15: ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare||7||
1019:16: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ|
1019:17: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam||8||
